japanese:
んんん……？
この単語、どういう意味だったっけ？
いや、もしかしたら慣用句かもしれない……。
translation:
Hmmmm...?
What did that word mean, again?
Maybe it's an idiom...

japanese:
そうだ、考えるんだ一花。
この苦労はいつか海外で番宣をするときに
必ず役立つはずだぞ！
translation:
That's right, think, Ichika.
This hardship will surely come in handy someday
when you go abroad for promotions!

japanese:
あ、いや……。
すまん、ちょっと飛躍しすぎだか。
translation:
Ah, well...
Sorry, maybe I said too much.

japanese: うん、意味がわからないんだけど。
translation: Yeah, what did you mean by that?

japanese:
……洋画を宣伝するためにメインキャストが来日して、
イベントに出演するとか、あるだろ？
translation:
...The main cast comes to Japan
to promote a Western movie and appear at events, right?

japanese:
お前も……そのうち世界的女優になれば
そういう仕事が舞い込んでくるだろうって……。
translation:
If you...
If you become a world-class actress someday,
that kind of work is going to come in...

japanese:
な、なんだその顔は！
まさか、そんな大きな夢なんて恐れ多い、とか
言い出すんじゃないだろうな！？
translation:
Wh-what's with that face?!
You wouldn't say that you
are afraid of such big dreams, are you?!

japanese:
ち、違うよ！
君が……急に私のこと、
持ち上げてくれちゃうからビックリして。
translation:
N-no, that's not it!
You...suddenly holding me in such high regard...
It just suprised me was all.

japanese:
……持ち上げてるつもりはねぇよ。
可能性はあるだろ？
translation:
...I wasn't trying to hold you to some high regard.
But there's certainly a possibility
you'll be able to do that, right?

japanese:
俺は、ただ勉強して良い点を取ればいいと
考えてるわけじゃない。
translation:
I don't only think about studying as a way for you guys to
just pass high school and get good grades.

japanese:
勉強することが、お前らの……
何かを変えるきっかけになるかもしれないと
考えてだな……。
translation:
I thought that studying...
might be an opportunity
for you guys to change something...

japanese:
ねえ、君は……
私が女優として大成功するって思ってる？
translation:
Hey, you...
Do you think I will be a great success as an actress?

japanese:
このままお仕事を続けて経験を積んでいったら、
いつか大女優になれるって、信じてくれてる？
translation:
Do you believe that if I keep working
and gain experience,
I will become a great actress one day?

japanese: ……間近でお前の演技を見てきたからな。
translation: ...I'm a huge fan, I've seen you perform up close.

japanese:
そっか……。
これは、もっともっと
気合いを入れなくちゃいけないな。
translation:
I see...
I've got to put a lot more effort into this.

japanese: 大切なファンをがっかりさせるわけにはいかないよ。
translation: I can't let my precious fans down.
